title: Potoaoes in promos
body: Why is it, that every time i get into any promos, the team amte ive been palying with that are semi decent or at least ahve a modicum of sense, suddenly disappear and i get put with absolute potatos?

replies.body: Just d queue and face roll

> [{quoted}](name=dragon poo,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=eFQ45OwH,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-25T02:45:43.245+0000)
>
> Potoaoes

I'm accustomed to potatoes being a reference to old/slow computers, but I had to post to point out the spelling in the title. I'm not trying to be a grammar Nazi, but at least try to get your titles correct people.

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=eFQ45OwH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-25T02:53:38.820+0000)
>
> I'm accustomed to potatoes being a reference to old/slow computers, but I had to post to point out the spelling in the title. I'm not trying to be a grammar Nazi, but at least try to get your titles correct people.

yeah, I read it in my mind with an Irish accent "Pot 'o' AOE's " like a pot full of AOE dmg >.>
Lol, i didnt realize, sortry its been a long night. kids make the brain fuzzy.

and this is why I feel that promos should be played as a duo or more. You can never rely on matchmaking and promos, those odds games with weird teammates can just randomly screw you over. If you earnt your way to promos then having friends help you isn't that bad.
